attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, I was shown a screen of small children shoved in cages and titles on it like “stinky immigrants” and “lets get rid of the Mexicans madicascar style” I was absolutely astonished that our president would do such a thing since he said he wasn’t racist. attributes.review: ugh! This app was so annoying. 0/10. Do not download. Ew. It kept glitching and my phone almost completely died when I had this app. On top of that the stuff that I was able to see on the app looked like a child had written it. Terrible grammar. Twisted views. Idiotic stances. Overall just disgustingly terrible. I wouldn’t recommend this app to my worst enemy.

attributes.review:
I used to love Trump, but I’m afraid i no longer can due to the contents of this app. Donald made the app to further boost his campaign, and I was happy to sign up. Shortly after downloading I was pressured 
into supporting the ‘BLM’ movement. Not only that I was told and encouraged to have an abortion! I have to say I am very disappointed in Donald, and I have no choice but to delete the app and stop supporting. #kanyewest2020
